concept.title: What is Google Bard?
concept.shortdesc: Google Bard is as a public, generative AI tool that allows you to get full-text, conversational responses to your questions.

conbody.p: Google Bard is an artificial intelligence chatbot that can respond to a user's questions (or prompts) on any subject with an almost human-like "understanding." It performs text-based tasks like creating various forms of content, summarizing text, and translating between languages.
